message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500, which is below its market value of $10,000 but still reflects its true worth. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available once it's been accepted. Don't miss out on this chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. If you're interested, please let us know so we can proceed with the transaction.
